getAbsolutePath

protected String getAbsolutePath(String path)
Returns the absolute path name of a file for lookup on the classpath.

Parameters:
path - the path name of the file to make absolute.
Returns:

Since:

addURL

protected void addURL(Logger logger,
                      File file,
                      List list)
Adds the URL of the specified file to the given list.

Note:

This method does nothing if the file cannot be converted to an URL.

Parameters:
logger - the logger to use for error reporting.
file - the file to convert to an URL and to add to the list.
list - the list to add the URL to.
Since:
1.9.1

getFileURLs

protected URL[] getFileURLs(Logger logger,
                            String[] files,
                            File root)
Returns an array of URLs for the specified file names.

Note:

The files are first searched on the classpath and if not found relative to the directory specified and finally as absolute files, in this order.

Parameters:
logger - the logger to use for error output.
files - the file names to convert to URLs.
root - the root directory for relative files.
Returns:
the URLs of the files found (may be less than the number of files passed in).
Since:
1.9.1

getDestinationDir

protected File getDestinationDir(File root,
                                 String dir)
Returns the destination directory to copy files to.

Warning:

If the destination directory cannot be found it will be created relative to the root directory specified.

Parameters:
root - the root directory the dir specified may be relative to.
dir - either a path relative to the root directory or an absolute path.
Returns:
the destination directory or null if the directory was not found and could not be created.
Since:
1.9.1

copyURL

protected void copyURL(Logger logger,
                       URL url,
                       File destinationDirectory)
Copies the data of the specified URL as a file with the URL name to the destination directory.

Warning:

Existing files will be overritten without warning.

Parameters:
logger - the logger to use for error output.
url - the URL to copy.
destinationDirectory - the destination directory to copy to.
Since:
1.9.1

configure

public void configure(Logger logger,
                      Configuration configuration)
Description copied from interface: SimpleTaglet
Configures this "simple" taglet.

Notes:

The SimpleTaglet.configure(Logger, Configuration) method is called at the start of the taglet lifecycle, prior to calling any output methods.

The configuration parameters of each "simple" taglet are taglet specific.

Specified by:
configure in interface SimpleTaglet
Overrides:
configure in class AbstractSimpleTaglet
Parameters:
logger - the logger to use for message output during configuration.
configuration - the taglets configuration to use for configuration.
Since:
1.9.1

shutdown

public void shutdown(Logger logger,
                     File outputDirectory)
Description copied from interface: ShutdownSupport
Called once all JavaDoc documentation has been generated.

Specified by:
shutdown in interface ShutdownSupport
Parameters:
logger - the logger to use for emiting messages.
outputDirectory - the directory the JavaDoc documentation was generated to, null if unknown.
Since:
1.9.1
